templateCommands.discord: Please join the {message.channel} Discord Server https://discord.gg/8tMgG4N, {message.user}
templateCommands.web: Please visit my web site at http://www.oldSkoolCoder.co.uk, {message.user}
templateCommands.forum: {message.user}, Please visit my forum site at http://forum.oldSkoolCoder.co.uk.
templateCommands.github: Please visit my GitHub site at http://github.com/OldSkoolCoder, {message.user}
templateCommands.KickTools: Tools : Editor : VSCode (http://https://code.visualstudio.com),  VSCode Extension : Kick Assembler (C64) for Visual Studio Code (https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=paulhocker.kick-assembler-vscode-ext) :  6502 Assembler : Kick Assembler (http://theweb.dk/KickAssembler) : Debugger : C64Debugger (https://sourceforge.net/projects/c64-debugger/) : CharPad Editor and SpritePad Editor (https://www.subchristsoftware.com)

descriptionCommands.hiya: This is the BOT telling you Hi
descriptionCommands.discord: Shows the Discord link for anybody to join
descriptionCommands.forum: Shows OldSkoolCoders Forum Web Site Link
descriptionCommands.KickTools: Shows The Kick Assembler tools OldSkoolCoders uses for coding retro
descriptionCommands.CPSTools: Shows The CBMPrg Studio IDE OldSkoolCoders uses for Commodore Coding
descriptionCommands.top10: Shows The top 10 users with Points
descriptionCommands.help: shows a list of available commands
descriptionCommands.vote: Allows Users to vote on current topic, Usage !vote 60
descriptionCommands.intro: Allows the user to announce themselves
descriptionCommands.plank: To Show the Streamer they're an idiot
descriptionCommands.play: Allows the user to play custom sounds

adminCommands.mymods: shows a list of all my channel moderators
adminCommands.addpoint: adds points to a user, format !addpoint @user value (Mods Only)
adminCommands.subpoint: subtracts points to a user, format !subpoint @user value (Mods Only)
adminCommands.addmod: Adds a moderator to this twitch BOT (Admin Only)
adminCommands.removemod: Removes a moderator from this twitch BOT (Admin Only)
adminCommands.startvote: Start a vote, Usage !Vote Topic Max, E.g. !startvote defender 100 (Admin Only)
